intro.p: Converts the Indigo reactions in one of the input table's columns into various string representations (RXN, SMILES).
This node uses Indigo classes to process structures.

fullDescription.option: The column that contains Indigo reactions.
Appends a new column (with the name as specified in the text field) if checked, replaces the original column otherwise.
Select the destination format here (Rxnfile, SMILES, Canonical SMILES). Canonical SMILES implies automatic aromatization of the structures.
Applicable only when the output format is Rxnfile

ports.outPort: Table with the reactions' converted string representations
